enter_coupon_code: Enter Coupon Code (Auto-generated if left blank)
issue_some_coupon: Issue Coupon (Up to 10,000 per request / 20 times per day)
coupon_application_note1: Please select the products to apply the coupon using the checkboxes, then click the <bold>Add Selected Products</bold> button to apply.
coupon_application_note2: Searching by SKU included in options or applying coupons to specific options is not supported.
search_placeholder: Search by Product Name or SKU
products_exclude_coupon_application: Select Products to Exclude from Coupon Application
coupon_exclude_note1: Please select the products to exclude from the coupon using the checkboxes, then click the <bold>Add Selected Products</bold> button to apply.
coupon_exclude_note2: Searching by SKU included in options or excluding specific options from coupon application is not supported.
